search.query: index=fischer sourcetype="fischer:console-db" | stats count by host

panel.title: Intitulé de la campagne sur Fischer-Console

search.query: index=fischer sourcetype="fischer:console-json" host=$campaign$ | stats latest(campaignId) as Campagne

panel.title: Date de lancement de la campagne sur Fischer-Console

search.query: index=fischer sourcetype="fischer:console-out" host=$campaign$ | reverse | head 1 | rex field=_raw "START : (?<launch_date>.*)" | stats latest(launch_date) as Date

panel.title: Nombre de cibles sur Fischer-Console

search.query: index=fischer sourcetype="fischer:console-json" host=$campaign$ | stats latest(count)

panel.title: Pourcentage de traitement email sur Fischer-Console

search.query: index=fischer sourcetype="fischer:console-json" host=$campaign$ | stats latest(send) as send latest(fail) as fail latest(count) as count | eval perc=100*((send+fail)/count) | eval perc=round(perc,0) | gauge perc

panel.title: Détection du mode de test sur Fischer-Console

search.query: index=fischer sourcetype="fischer:console-out" host=$campaign$ NOT "START" | rex field=_raw "\d\d:\d\d:\d\d;(?<status>[^;]*);" | eval check_mode=if(status == "CheckOnly","Oui","Non") | stats latest(check_mode)

panel.title: Etat des envois sur Fischer-Console

search.query: index=fischer sourcetype="fischer:console-out" host=$campaign$ | rex field=_raw "\d\d:\d\d:\d\d;(?<status>[^;]*);" | stats count as Nombre by status | rename status as Etat | addcoltotals labelfield=Etat

panel.title: Etat des envois sur Fischer-Agent

search.query: `fischer_exim_transaction` | rex field=_raw "\d\d\d\d-\d\d-\d\d \d\d:\d\d:\d\d (?<message_id>[^ ]*) (?<message>.*)" | search [search `fischer_exim_transaction` | rex field=_raw "\d\d\d\d-\d\d-\d\d \d\d:\d\d:\d\d (?<message_id>[^ ]*) (?<message>.*)" | rex field=message "<= (?<sender>[^ ]*) H=\((?<sender_host>[^)]*)\) \[(?<sender_ip>[^\]]*)\]" | rex field=message "<= (?<sender>[^ ]*) H=(?<resolved_host>[^ ]*) \((?<sender_host>[^)]*)\) \[(?<sender_ip>[^\]]*)\]" | search sender_host=$campaign$ | table message_id] | rex field=message "<= (?<sender>[^ ]*) H=\((?<sender_host>[^)]*)\) \[(?<sender_ip>[^\]]*)\]" | rex field=message "<= (?<sender>[^ ]*) H=(?<resolved_host>[^ ]*) \((?<sender_host>[^)]*)\) \[(?<sender_ip>[^\]]*)\]" | rex field=message "(\=\>|\=\=|\*\*) (?<recipient>[^ ]*) " | search NOT recipient=$bcc$ | transaction message_id | eval delivery_status=case(message LIKE "=>%","Délivré",message LIKE "==%","Différé",message LIKE "**%","Refusé") | stats count as Nombre by delivery_status | rename delivery_status as Etat | addcoltotals labelfield=Etat

drilldown.link: search?q=`fischer_exim_transaction` | rex field=_raw "\d\d\d\d-\d\d-\d\d \d\d:\d\d:\d\d (%3F<message_id>[^ ]*) (%3F<message>.*)" | rex field=message "<= (%3F<sender>[^ ]*) H=\((%3F<sender_host>[^)]*)\) \[(%3F<sender_ip>[^\]]*)\]" | rex field=message "<= (%3F<sender>[^ ]*) H=(%3F<resolved_host>[^ ]*) \((%3F<sender_host>[^)]*)\) \[(%3F<sender_ip>[^\]]*)\]" | eval delivery_status=case(message LIKE "=>%25","Délivré",message LIKE "==%25","Différé",message LIKE "**%25","Refusé") | rex field=message "(\=\>|\=\=|\*\*) (%3F<recipient>[^ ]*) " | transaction message_id | search sender_host=$campaign$&earliest=$earliest$&latest=$latest$

panel.title: Pourcentage de traitement email sur Fischer-Agent

search.query: `fischer_exim_transaction` | rex field=_raw "\d\d\d\d-\d\d-\d\d \d\d:\d\d:\d\d (?<message_id>[^ ]*) (?<message>.*)" | search [search `fischer_exim_transaction` | rex field=_raw "\d\d\d\d-\d\d-\d\d \d\d:\d\d:\d\d (?<message_id>[^ ]*) (?<message>.*)" | rex field=message "<= (?<sender>[^ ]*) H=\((?<sender_host>[^)]*)\) \[(?<sender_ip>[^\]]*)\]" | rex field=message "<= (?<sender>[^ ]*) H=(?<resolved_host>[^ ]*) \((?<sender_host>[^)]*)\) \[(?<sender_ip>[^\]]*)\]" | search sender_host=$campaign$ | table message_id] | rex field=message "<= (?<sender>[^ ]*) H=\((?<sender_host>[^)]*)\) \[(?<sender_ip>[^\]]*)\]" | rex field=message "<= (?<sender>[^ ]*) H=(?<resolved_host>[^ ]*) \((?<sender_host>[^)]*)\) \[(?<sender_ip>[^\]]*)\]" | eval delivery_status=case(message LIKE "=>%","Délivré",message LIKE "==%","Différé",message LIKE "**%","Refusé") | rex field=message "(\=\>|\=\=|\*\*) (?<recipient>[^ ]*) " | search NOT recipient=$bcc$ | transaction message_id | eval defered=if(delivery_status == "Différé",1,0) | eval rejected=if(delivery_status == "Refusé",1,0) | eval delivered=if(delivery_status == "Délivré",1,0) | stats sum(defered) as Defered sum(rejected) as Rejected sum(delivered) as Delivered | eval Total=[ search index=fischer sourcetype="fischer:console-json" host=$campaign$ | stats latest(count) as c | return $c] | eval perc=100*((Delivered+Rejected)/Total) | eval perc=round(perc,0) | gauge perc

panel.title: Accès à l'image de tracking par OS

search.query: index=fischer sourcetype="fischer:nginx" "/images/*.gif" | rex field=uri_path "/images/(?<hash>[^.]*).gif" | search [search index=fischer sourcetype="fischer:console-db" host=$campaign$ | table hash] | lookup user_agents http_user_agent| stats count as Nombre by ua_os_family | rename ua_os_family as OS

panel.title: Accès à l'image de tracking par navigateur

search.query: index=fischer sourcetype="fischer:nginx" "/images/*.gif" | rex field=uri_path "/images/(?<hash>[^.]*).gif" | search [search index=fischer sourcetype="fischer:console-db" host=$campaign$ | table hash] | lookup user_agents http_user_agent| stats count as Nombre by ua_family | rename ua_family as Navigateur

panel.title: Accès à la page d'accueil par OS sur le site Web

search.query: index=fischer sourcetype="fischer:nginx" uri_query="id=*" | rex field=uri_query "/?id=(?<hash>[^&]*)" | search [search index=fischer sourcetype="fischer:console-db" host=$campaign$ | table hash] | lookup user_agents http_user_agent| stats count as Nombre by ua_os_family | rename ua_os_family as OS

panel.title: Accès à la page d'accueil par navigateur sur le site Web

search.query: index=fischer sourcetype="fischer:nginx" uri_query="id=*" | rex field=uri_query "/?id=(?<hash>[^&]*)" | search [search index=fischer sourcetype="fischer:console-db" host=$campaign$ | table hash] | lookup user_agents http_user_agent| stats count as Nombre by ua_family | rename ua_family as Navigateur

panel.title: Nombre d'utilisateurs ayant ouvert le message

search.query: index=fischer sourcetype="fischer:nginx" "/images/*.gif" | rex field=uri_path "/images/(?<hash>[^.]*).gif" | search [search index=fischer sourcetype="fischer:console-db" host=$campaign$ | table hash] | stats dc(hash)

panel.title: Nombre d'utilisateurs ayant ouvert le lien

search.query: index=fischer sourcetype="fischer:php" stat=OK action=index [search index=fischer sourcetype="fischer:console-db" host=$campaign$ | table hash] | stats dc(hash)

drilldown.link: search?q=index=fischer sourcetype="fischer:php" stat=OK action=index [search index=fischer sourcetype="fischer:console-db" host=$campaign$ | table hash]&earliest=$earliest$&latest=$latest$

panel.title: Nombre d'utilisateurs ayant soumis le formulaire

search.query: index=fischer sourcetype="fischer:php" stat=OK action=form [search index=fischer sourcetype="fischer:console-db" host=$campaign$ | table hash] | stats dc(hash)

drilldown.link: search?q=index=fischer sourcetype="fischer:php" stat=OK action=form [search index=fischer sourcetype="fischer:console-db" host=$campaign$ | table hash]&earliest=$earliest$&latest=$latest$

panel.title: Pourcentage d'utilisateurs ayant ouvert le lien

search.query: index=fischer sourcetype="fischer:php" stat=OK action=index [search index=fischer sourcetype="fischer:console-db" host=$campaign$ | table hash] | stats dc(hash) AS number | eval total= [search index=fischer sourcetype="fischer:console-json" host=$campaign$ | stats latest(count) AS temp | return $temp] | eval restant=total-number | table number,restant | rename number as "Utilisateurs ayant cliqué" restant AS "Utilisateurs n'ayant pas cliqué" | transpose

panel.title: Pourcentage d'utilisateurs ayant soumis le formulaire

search.query: index=fischer sourcetype="fischer:php" stat=OK action=form [search index=fischer sourcetype="fischer:console-db" host=$campaign$ | table hash] | stats dc(hash) AS number | eval total= [search index=fischer sourcetype="fischer:console-json" host=$campaign$ | stats latest(count) AS temp | return $temp] | eval restant=total-number | table number,restant | rename number as "Utilisateurs ayant soumis" restant AS "Utilisateurs n'ayant pas soumis" | transpose

panel.title: Répartition temporelle

search.query: index=fischer sourcetype="fischer:php" (stat=OK action=index OR action=form) [search index=fischer sourcetype="fischer:console-db" host=$campaign$ | table hash] | bucket _time span=1h | timechart dc(hash) by action | rename form AS Soumissions index AS Ouvertures | fields _time Ouvertures Soumissions

panel.title: Répartition par $second_field_csv$

search.query: index=fischer sourcetype="fischer:php" stat=OK (action=form OR action=index) [search index=fischer sourcetype="fischer:console-db" host=$campaign$ | table hash] | join hash [search index=fischer sourcetype="fischer:console-db" host=$campaign$ | table hash,name,department,email] | chart dc(hash) BY department,action | append [search index=fischer sourcetype="fischer:console-db" host=$campaign$ | stats values(department) AS department | mvexpand department ] | dedup department | sort department | table department,index,form | appendcols [search index=fischer sourcetype="fischer:console-db" host=$campaign$ | stats dc(hash) AS Cibles BY department | table Cibles] | rename index AS "Ouvertures" form AS "Soumissions" department AS $second_field_csv$

panel.title: Pourcentage par $second_field_csv$

search.query: index=fischer sourcetype="fischer:php" stat=OK (action=form OR action=index) [search index=fischer sourcetype="fischer:console-db" host=$campaign$ | table hash] | join hash [search index=fischer sourcetype="fischer:console-db" host=$campaign$ | table hash,name,department,email] | chart dc(hash) BY department,action | append [search index=fischer sourcetype="fischer:console-db" host=$campaign$ | stats values(department) AS department | mvexpand department] | dedup department | sort department | appendcols [search index=fischer sourcetype="fischer:console-db" host=$campaign$ | stats dc(hash) AS total by department ] | eval perc_index=100*(index/total) | eval perc_index=round(perc_index,0) | eval perc_form=100*(form/total) | eval perc_form=round(perc_form,0) | table department,perc_index,perc_form | rename perc_index AS "Ouvertures" perc_form AS "Soumissions" department AS $second_field_csv$

panel.title: Répartition par $first_field_csv$

search.query: index=fischer sourcetype="fischer:php" stat=OK (action=form OR action=index) [search index=fischer sourcetype="fischer:console-db" host=$campaign$ | table hash] | join hash [search index=fischer sourcetype="fischer:console-db" host=$campaign$ | table hash,name,country,email] | chart dc(hash) BY country,action | append [search index=fischer sourcetype="fischer:console-db" host=$campaign$ | stats values(country) AS country | mvexpand country ] | dedup country | sort country | table country,index,form | appendcols [search index=fischer sourcetype="fischer:console-db" host=$campaign$ | stats dc(hash) AS Cibles BY country | table Cibles] | rename index AS "Ouvertures" form AS "Soumissions" country AS $first_field_csv$

panel.title: Pourcentage par $first_field_csv$

search.query: index=fischer sourcetype="fischer:php" stat=OK (action=form OR action=index) [search index=fischer sourcetype="fischer:console-db" host=$campaign$ | table hash] | join hash [search index=fischer sourcetype="fischer:console-db" host=$campaign$ | table hash,name,country,email] | chart dc(hash) BY country,action | append [search index=fischer sourcetype="fischer:console-db" host=$campaign$ | stats values(country) AS country | mvexpand country] | dedup country | sort country | appendcols [search index=fischer sourcetype="fischer:console-db" host=$campaign$ | stats dc(hash) AS total by country ] | eval perc_index=100*(index/total) | eval perc_index=round(perc_index,0) | eval perc_form=100*(form/total) | eval perc_form=round(perc_form,0) | table country,perc_index,perc_form | rename perc_index AS "Ouvertures" perc_form AS "Soumissions" country AS $first_field_csv$

panel.title: Répartition géographique des soumissions

search.query: index=fischer sourcetype="fischer:php" stat=OK action=form [search index=fischer sourcetype="fischer:console-db" host=$campaign$ | table hash] | iplocation ip_src | geostats latfield=lat longfield=lon dc(hash)

panel.title: Liste des soumissions

search.query: index=fischer sourcetype="fischer:php" stat=OK action=form [search index=fischer sourcetype="fischer:console-db" host=$campaign$ | table hash] | eval supervisor_pwd=sha256($pwd$) | search supervisor_pwd=139979d20fb8303eacdd029e61b5d5838d94b0f0f8678505b1915f3f0ea0b4f6 | join hash [search index=fischer sourcetype="fischer:console-db" host=$campaign$ | table hash,name,department,country,email] | eval Heure=strftime(_time, "%Y-%d-%m %H:%M:%S") | table Heure,name,email,country,department | rename name AS Nom department AS $second_field_csv$ country AS $first_field_csv$ email AS Courriel
